posts.title: A day in the life of a Software Engineer at Holland & Barrett
posts.description: This article should give you a rough idea of what a typical day in a software engineers life for the UKs leading health and wellness retailer looks like.

posts.title: What Open AI's GPT-3 means for developer jobs
posts.description: If you have been on Twitter, or anywhere on the internet for that matter, over the last few weeks, you will have come across the cryptic abbreviation "GPT-3", which stands for "Generative Pre-Training (of language models)", version 3.

posts.title: How to get hired as a developer or software engineer in 2020
posts.description: I have been a senior front-end engineer at one of the largest publishers in the UK for the past year and recently decided to move on, after my employer announced, that it would make a quarter of its employees redundant. It took me exactly one week to get hired by another company with a more exciting tech stack, and with a salary increase. How did I do it? By standing out to recruiters.

posts.title: How to stand out as a software engineer or developer on LinkedIn
posts.description: In this article, I explain to you what I have been doing to my LinkedIn profile to get contacted by 3-5 recruiters every single day!
